results.name: a(1)=3,  a(2)=1, a(n)=3*a(n-1) + a(n-2)
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,1).
program: (Maxima) a[1]:3$ a[2]:1$ a[n]:=3*a[n-1]+a[n-2]$ makelist(a[n], n, 1, 28);  [Bruno Berselli, May 24 2011]
